title: Nebraska Department of Health and Human Services (DHHS)
description: A directory of peer support services for substance abuse and mental health recovery.
howToAccess: Visit Nebraska DHHS Behavioral Health Services or call Nebraska 211

title: Region 6 Behavioral Healthcare
description: Peer support and mentorship for eastern Nebraska residents, focusing on substance abuse and mental health.
howToAccess: Call (402) 444-6573 or visit Region 6 Peer Support Services

title: Heartland Family Service
description: Peer mentorship for substance abuse and co-occurring disorders in Omaha.
howToAccess: Contact at (402) 553-3000 or visit Heartland Family Service

title: Faces & Voices of Recovery
description: Connects you with peer recovery coaches and mentors through a national network.
howToAccess: Visit Faces & Voices of Recovery website

title: National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI)
description: Peer-led support groups and mentorship for mental health recovery, including dual diagnosis cases.
howToAccess: Find groups at NAMI Support Group Locator
